Variable.name: surv_time
Comment: Created by R-program from date_of_incidence and end_of_followupIf Autopsy = 1 then Surv_time = 0

Variable.name: entity_level1
Variable.label.description: Cancer site/grouping of cancer sites according to NORDCAN-definition
Comment: Created by R-program from ICD10 and Morpho (lymphomas and leukaemias)Only lowest level entities are set here. Grouping of entities are done when aggregating data.
